data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD continues to juggle above $1,980.00 ahead of Fed policy and US data
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is displaying a back-and-forth action above $1,980.00 in the Tokyo session. The precious metal is struggling to find direction as investors are awaiting the announcement of the Federal Reserve's (Fed) monetary policy and other key United States data.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD struggles below $2,000 amid US default fears, hawkish Fed bets
data.text: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD struggles below $2,000 amid US default fears, hawkish Fed bets

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD finds a cushion around $1,980, downside seems favored ahead of Fed policy
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is continuously defending downside around the crucial support of $1,980.00 for the past few weeks. The precious metal is prone to downside as the appeal for the US Dollar Index (DXY) is improving ahead of the interest rate decision by the Federal Reserve (Fed).

data.title: Gold, Silver, Platinum – Silver Faced Strong Resistance Near $26.00
data.text: Precious metals are losing ground as Treasury yields are moving higher.

data.title: Gold Prices Turn Lower as US Economic Data Weakens Case for Fed Pause
data.text: Gold prices retreat as U.S. ISM manufacturing data weakens the case for a Fed pause, triggering a sharp rally in U.S. Treasury yields.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD dips below $2000 on improved ISM report, as high inflation looms
data.text: Gold price slides below the $2000 barrier on a report by the Institute for Supply Management (ISM), showing that manufacturing activity is improving. However, a jump in the prices subcomponent justifies the need for higher rates in the United States (US).

data.title: Gold Price Forecast – Gold Markets Recover After Initial Selloff
data.text: Goal markets continue to find buyers on dips as we have sold off early on Monday, only to turn right back around again.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD jumps back above $2,000 mark, upside seems limited
data.text: Gold price attracts some dip-buying near the $1,977 region on Monday and climbs to a fresh daily high heading into the North American session. The XAU/USD is currently placed just above the $2,000 psychological mark, though remains confined in a familiar trading range held over the past two weeks or so.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD grinds lower past $1,990 hurdle, focus on Fed, US NFP – Confluence Detector
data.text: Gold Price (XAU/USD) holds lower grounds within a short-term trading range past $2,000 as holidays in multiple markets restrict the bullion's moves as the key week begins. Even so, the US Dollar's recent run-up, backed by upbeat US inflation clues, weighs on the Gold price.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU Prices Slip on Strong US Dollar Ahead of Fed Rate-Hike Decision
data.text: Bearish gold traders want hawkish Fed message, but XAU could rise if Fed hints at rate hike pause or cut later in the year.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD sees downside below $1,970 as USD Index rebounds and US banking woes ease
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is declining towards its crucial support of $1,970.00 in the Asian session. A solid recovery in the US Dollar Index (DXY) amid upbeat expectations that the Federal Reserve (Fed) will raise interest rates one more time by 25 basis points (bps) on Wednesday is impacting the Gold price.

data.title: Gold Price Trapped Ahead of a Busy Week as US Dollar Pauses. Where to for XAU/USD?
data.text: The gold price slipped at the open on Monday as traders prepare for the Fed's interest rate decision and the potential for impact across the yield curve and on the US Dollar.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD bears approach $1,980 support on First Republic woes, Fed, US NFP eyed
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) drops towards a short-term key support confluence as sour sentiment underpins the US Dollar demand and weighs on the metal prices during the early trading hours of the key week. That said, the XAU/USD renews its intraday low near $1,986 as it bears the burden of the market's fears emanating from First Republic Bank amid hawkish hopes from the Federal Reserve, especially after the recently firmer United States inflation clues.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/JUSD struggles to find direction as focus shifts to Fed policy
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is hovering around $1,990.00 in the early Asian session. The precious metal is struggling to find any direction as investors are awaiting the announcement of the interest rate decision by the Federal Reserve (Fed).

data.title: Could the Debt Ceiling Drama Uplift Gold?
data.text: While the 2011 analog paints an optimistic portrait for gold, silver and mining stocks, a re-enactment of the last debacle is unlikely to unfold this time around.

data.title: Gold Erased Its April Rally – What's Next?
data.text: This month in gold, ultimately, nothing happened except gold's failure to break above $2,000.

data.text: United States CFTC Gold NC Net Positions dipped from previous $189.9K to $185.3K

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: Volatility Compresses as Bull Pennant Pattern Emerges
data.text: The first pennant formed over 11 days and broke out on the 12th day, while the current formation is completing its 10th day today.

data.title: Gold Weekly Price Forecast – Gold Markets Give Up Early Gains for the Week
data.text: The gold market has initially shot higher during the trading week, but then found a lot of selling pressure as gold might be a little overbought.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD holds steady around $1990s after data shows persistent inflation
data.text: Gold price registers minimal gains, as traders brace for the weekend, gains 0.16%% after data from the United States (US) showed that inflation remains at high levels, justifying the need for further tightening by the US Federal Reserve. After hitting a daily low of 1976.31, the XAU/USD is trading at $1992.93, up 0.28%.
